sku.title: sku
sku.description: A unique identifier for the product in the shop.

inventory_quantity.title: inventory_quantity
inventory_quantity.description: The number of items in stock for this product variant. Default value: 1

old_inventory_quantity.title: old_inventory_quantity
old_inventory_quantity.description: The original stock level the client believes the product variant has. This should be sent to avoid a race condition when the item being adjusted is simultaneously sold online.

inventory_quantity_adjustment.title: inventory_quantity_adjustment
inventory_quantity_adjustment.description: Instead of sending a new and old value for inventory an adjustment value can be sent. If an adjustment value is sent it will take priority.

inventory_management.title: inventory_management
inventory_management.description: Specifies whether Shopify tracks the number of items in stock for this product variant. Valid values are shopify or the name of a fulfillment service provider with inventory management enabled. See FulfillmentService for more information. For fulfillment service providers, must be the same provider that fulfills the product variant.

inventory_policy.title: inventory_policy
inventory_policy.description: Specifies whether or not customers are allowed to place an order for a product variant when it's out of stock. Valid values are: continue, deny (default).

price.title: price
price.description: The price of the product variant.
